categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Renhoek was a group of at least six Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports based on the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Stimsenj'kat.

In 0 ABY, they participated in the recovery of much needed lonsigar from abandoned cargo containers in an asteroid field, and faced the first combat deployment of the TIE Advanced against the Rebellion. All of the transports completed their mission and fled aboard the Stimsenj'kat.
